confirmRemove: Confirm to delete the data in ${name}?

hello.makesure: Before using this template, please read the offical sample, make sure that you've known about the pipeline for plugin developing.

splitFlag: The delimiter between the property name and the property value
maxIndex: The maximum length of the property name, 0 means unlimited, if the delimiter appears outside this length, won't split property name and the property value
